mapper.select: SELECT description, tourDayId, day FROM TOUR_DAY WHERE fk_tourId=#{id}
SELECT SUM(p.averageTimeSpent) as totalTime FROM PLACE p WHERE p.placeId IN (SELECT ptd.fk_placeId FROM PLACE_TOUR_DAY ptd WHERE ptd.fk_tourDayId = #{tourDayId} )

SELECT SUM(IFNULL(tpt.duration,0)) as duration, SUM(IFNULL(tpt.distance,0)) as distance FROM PLACE_TOUR_DAY ptd INNER JOIN TRANSPORT_PLACE_TOUR tpt ON ptd.id = tpt.fk_placeTourId WHERE ptd.fk_tourDayId=#{tourDayId}
